title: Fried Oysters
description: Pearl Oyster Bar has the best fried oysters. It is a given that we will order this when we go.
ingrediants: Mayo. Add a dash of lemon juice. You just want to cut the taste of the mayo. One pinch of parsley. Shuck oysters(most places will do this for you). Add tartar to the bottom of shells.
Mix 3 parts flour to 1 part cracker meal. Saut√© in oil. Add a dash of salt when you remove from the pan onto a paper towel. Place on oysters and server immediately
